idea-plugin.name: Base16 Atlas
idea-plugin.vendor: Alex Lende (https://ajlende.com), Chris Kempson, and Shirom Makkad
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Atlas for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Alex Lende (https://ajlende.com). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
